description: This is a CMake script file containing macros, functions, and commands for building, packaging, and managing dependencies within a CMake-based project. It includes utility macros, target property retrieval functions, and installation helpers for configs and modules, primarily to facilitate the integration and consumption of libraries and packages.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Appends an element to a specified list variable.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Parses a library filename to obtain its base name and directory for linking purposes.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Retrieves link libraries and directories for a given target, considering imported targets and dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Collects all compile definitions for a target, including interface definitions and dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Gathers compile options for a target, including interface options and dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Gathers include directories for a target, resolving interface and direct include paths.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Generates and installs a CMake package config file for a target, including dependencies and version info.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Creates and installs a package configuration file (.pc) for pkg-config, incorporating compile options, defines, include paths, and libraries.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Installs additional CMake find modules from a specified directory, optionally recursing into subdirectories.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Outputs the list of all CMake property names supported by cmake --help-property-list.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Prints all supported properties and their values for a specified target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Replaces semicolons in a string with an ASCII char to make it safe for CMake variable passing.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Creates a compatible, legacy-friendly interface target for a given target, copying headers and linking dependencies, and installing related config files.
